sourcesContent:
import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import React,{useState} from "react"; import { Table } from "reactstrap"; const Dashboard=()=>{ const [currentState,setCurrentState]=useState(AppState.SCHEDULE); const [name,setName]=useState("Maaz"); const [email,setEmail]=useState("2017ee83@student.uet.edu.pk"); const [section,setSection]=useState(["A","B"]); const params=useParams(); const [timeSlots,setTimeSlots]=useState([ "12:00Am-01:00Am", "02:00Am-03:00Am", "03:00Am-04:00Am", "04:00Am-05:00Am", "05:00Am-06:00Am", "06:00Am-07:00Am", "07:00Am-08:00Am", "08:00Am-09:00Am", "09:00Am-10:00Am", "10:00Am-11:00Am", "11:00Am-12:00Pm", "12:00Pm-01:00Pm", "02:00Pm-03:00Pm", "03:00Pm-04:00Pm", "04:00Pm-05:00Pm", "05:00Pm-06:00Pm", "06:00Pm-07:00Pm", "07:00Pm-08:00Pm", "08:00Pm-09:00Pm", "09:00Pm-10:00Pm", "10:00Pm-11:00Pm", "11:00Pm-12:00Am", ]) const [lectures,setLectures]=useState({ Lecture1:["Database(Class 123:A)","Machine Learning(Class 125)","Computer Networks(Class 126)",null,"Database Lab(Class 211)",null,null], Lecture2:["Machine Learning(Class 125)","Computer Netwroks Lab(Class 127)","Operation Systems(Class 225)",null,"Database Lab(Class 212)",null,null], Lecture3:["Operation Systems(Class 125)","Machine Learning(Class 123:A)","Computer Networks(Class 225)",null,"Database Lab(Class 126)",null,null], Lecture4:["Operation Systems(Class 211)","Machine Learning(Class 126)","Computer Networks(Class 123:A)",null,"Database Lab(Class 127)",null,null], Lecture5:["Database(Class 211)","Machine Learning(Class 125)","Computer Networks(Class 225)","Machine Learning Lab(Class 126)",null,null,null], Lecture6:["Machine Learning(Class 123:A)","Operation Systems(Class 125)","Database(Class 126)",null,null,null,null], }); const [assignments,setAssignments]=useState({ monday:{ Assignment:"Database", Deadline:"11-00PM", Quiz:"Operating Systems Quiz", Venue:"Class 123:A" }, tuesday:{ Assignment:null, Deadline:null, }, wednesday:{ Assignment:null, Deadline:null, }, thursday:{ Assignment:null, Deadline:null, }, friday:{ Assignment:null, Deadline:null, }, saturday:{ Assignment:null, Deadline:null, }, sunday:{ Assignment:"Machine Learning", Deadline:"12-00PM" } }) return(
{name}
{email}
Schedules:
{section.map((sec)=>{ return( <>
  • Section {sec}
    • ) })}
    { parseInt(params.id)===1 && <>
    Change Schedule
    Add Quiz
    Add Assignment
    }
    {currentState===AppState.SCHEDULE && <>
    Time Monday Tuessday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday
    1 Mark Otto @mdo
    2 Jacob Thornton @fat
    3 Larry the Bird @twitter
    }
    ) }; export class AppState{ static SCHEDULE="schedule"; static CHANGE_SCHEDULE="change_shecdule"; static ADD_QUIZ="add_quiz"; static ADD_ASSIGNMENT="add_assignment"; } export default Dashboard;
